src:
性侵案發酵？劉強東因「個人原因」辭去政協委員

07 Nov 2019, 21:29

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月08日訊】據中共央視7日晚的新聞聯播報導，中共全國政協第十三屆常委會第九次會議當天閉幕，會議接受劉強東「因個人原因」請辭第十三屆全國政協委員。
根據中共的《中國人民政治協商會議章程》第38條規定，對違反社會道德或存在與身份不符行為的政協委員，應當及時約談或函詢，經提醒仍不改正的，應當責令其辭去委員。
京東集團創始人劉強東去年開始深陷性侵醜聞，至今仍未脫身。
去年8月底，劉強東在美國明尼蘇達州因涉嫌性侵一名中國籍女大學生，一度被捕。同年12月21日，美國當地檢方決定不予刑事起訴。但今年4月16日，受害女大學生正式對劉強東提起民事訴訟，目前官司還在進行中。今年8月，劉強東的妻子章澤天遠赴英國劍橋大學讀書。
（記者鄭鼓笙報導/責任編輯：明軒）
本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/07/a102702175.html
text:
Sexual assault fermenting? Liu Qiangdong resigned as a member of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference for "personal reasons"

07 Nov 2019, 21:29

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 08, 2019] According to the news broadcast of the CCTV on the evening of the 7th, the ninth meeting of the 13th Standing Committee of the CPPCC National Committee closed on the same day. The meeting accepted Liu Qiangdong’s resignation for personal reasons. Member of the 13th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political
According to Article 38 of the Constitution of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, members of the CPPCC who violate social morality or existence and identity misconduct should promptly interview or ask for a letter. If they are still not corrected, they should be ordered to resign. Member.
Liu Qiangdong, the founder of Jingdong Group, began to fall into the scandal of sexual assault last year and has not yet left.
At the end of August last year, Liu Qiangdong was arrested in Minnesota for allegedly sexually assaulting a Chinese female university student. On December 21 of the same year, the local prosecution in the United States decided not to criminally prosecute. However, on April 16 this year, the female university student who was victimized formally filed a civil lawsuit against Liu Qiangdong. The lawsuit is still in progress. In August of this year, Liu Qiangdong’s wife, Zhang Zetian, went to Cambridge University in the UK to study.
(Reporter Zheng Drums Report / Editor: Ming Xuan)
